plot: Alberto Garcia is an Argentine tango dancer who experiences the loss of his wife and dance partner Vanessa at the pinnacle of his career, and now must find a way to say good-bye and move on.
title: Desde el Alma
plot_es: Alberto Garcia is an Argentine tango dancer who experiences the loss of his wife and dance partner Vanessa at the pinnacle of his career, and now must find a way to say good-bye and move on.
plot_en: Alberto Garcia is an Argentine tango dancer who experiences the loss of his wife and dance partner Vanessa at the pinnacle of his career, and now must find a way to say good-bye and move on.
